definition: lit. red-bellied devotion (idiom); wholehearted loyalty/to serve sb with body and soul
gall bladder/courage/guts/gall/inner container (e.g. bladder of a football, inner container of a thermos)

sentences.english: We must serve the people with utter devotion.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須赤膽忠心爲人民。
喬伊是一個赤膽忠心的人。

sentences.english: And do you mean to insinuate that there is not a sort of devotion in that?
sentences.chinese: 難道你還能拐彎兒抹角兒地說這不算是赤膽忠心嗎？
